data.title: TV celebrities who have changed their names
data.meta_description: Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon? actress Dalljiet Kaur recently changed her official name to Deepa. The actress broke the news on Instagram, where she posted her selfie and captioned it as, "Introducing “DEEPA” for those “who love me and want to associate with me” - dedicated to mommy- ❤️ #deepa# #deepaandjaydon #jaydonanddeepa#". She said that her mother felt that her name was complicated. The actress was born during Diwali and her family calls her as Deepa.(Photo:Instagram)
data.text:
Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon? actress Dalljiet Kaur recently changed her official name to Deepa. The actress broke the news on Instagram, where she posted her selfie and captioned it as, "Introducing “DEEPA” for those “who love me and want to associate with me” - dedicated to mommy- ❤️ #deepa# #deepaandjaydon #jaydonanddeepa#". She said that her mother felt that her name was complicated. The actress was born during Diwali and her family calls her as Deepa.(Photo:Instagram)

Naagin actor Karanvir Bohra was named Manoj by his paternal grandfather, who was quite close to the superstar Manoj Kumar and wanted him to become like one. When the actor made his debut with Kasautii Zindagi Kayy on the small screen, the actor changed his name to Karanvir. (Photo:Instagram)

Popular television actor Gauahar Khan changed the spelling of her name and believed that it will bring a change in her fate. Soon, the actress was seen in the celebrity reality show Bigg Boss season 7, where she emerged as the winner. It seems as Gauahar's name proved to be a game-changer for her and after the show, the gorgeous actress also managed to bag various projects. (Photo:Instagram)

Anita Hassanandani, who plays the role of Shagun in Yeh Hai Mohabbatein, also changed her official name from Natasha to Anita. She then made her television debut with Ekta Kapoor's show Kabhii Sautan Kabhii Sahelii. Within no time, the actress gained a lot of popularity in the industry and bagged several other shows. She even got to try her luck in Bollywood.(Photo:Instagram)

Pyaar Kii Ye Ek Kahaani actress Vahbiz Dorabjee changed her name. The actress dropped an extra 'b' from her name and became Vahbiz. She made a cameo role in the Pyaar Kii Ye Ek Kahaani show and was later seen in Saraswatichandra show. Vahbiz was later seen in popular show Bahu Hamari Rajni Kant, where she played the role of Maggie Kant.(Photo:Instagram)

The actress Ridheema Tiwari changed her identity from Shweta and renamed herself as Ridheema. The actress said that during her struggle time, she faced a lot of issues due to her name Shweta which was way too common. She consulted her guru and named herself as Ridheema. Recently, the actress even changed the spelling of her name and added her mother’s initial to it. It seems as the actress believes a lot in numerology. (Photo:Instagram)

Uttaran actress Rashami changed her name nine years ago. Her original name was Divya. The actress said that her mother changed her name after consulting a professional numerologist and it has worked in her favour. Rashami has done several shows on television including Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 5, Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi, Dil Se Dil Tak and Nach Baliye 7 in 2015. (Photo:Instagram)

Television's popular actor Gaurav Chopra added an extra ‘A’ to his surname. Someone renowned had suggested this to Gaurav Chopraa's mother, which prompted him to change his surname. Soon, after that, the actor bagged a film and several other offers from the industry. (Photo:Instagram)

Television actress, Kishwer Merchantt, changed her name two years back and changed ‘A’ to ‘E’ in her maiden name and added an extra ‘T’ in her surname. The actress feels that the change in her name and surname has worked in her favor and she has become more popular after that.(Photo:Instagram)
